summary: An enchanted augments which can be weared or accchieved through perk progress
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][font=Arial]Adds five types of augment in two ways to be used :[/font][/i]

[/size][size=3][b]1. [/b][font=Arial]They can be crafted and worn as jewelry,if you have neccessery ingridients.They have no worn restriction and aro not qualified as
weapon,jewelry or armor,so you can equip all five,though the inventory will recognize them as jewelry.[/font]

[/size][font=Courier New][size=3][u]Following augments :[/u][/size][/font]
[size=4][font=Courier New]Augment : Eyes [/font]          [/size][size=3]- enables night vision[/size]
[font=Courier New][size=4]Augment : Scholar[/size][/font][size=3][font=Courier New]  [/font]- increased magicka regeneration and speechcraft[/size]
[size=4][font=Courier New]Augment : Lungs[/font]         -[/size][size=3] poison resistance and waterbreathing[/size]
[size=4][font=Courier New]Augment : Limbs[/font]         - [/size][size=3]reduced falling damage[/size]
[size=4][font=Courier New]Augment : Legs    [/font] - [/size][size=3]muffled movement[/size]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Augment  : Financial[/size][/font][font=Arial][size=3]     which raises your selling prices by 30%-[/size][/font]

[b]2. [/b][font=Arial]They can also be obtained through the perks advancement in the light armor skill tree,where helmet is excluded from armor set as condition also.[/font]

[font=Courier New][size=3]Enhanced Eyes[/size] -[/font] [b][i][font=Comic Sans MS]See items names and values[/font][/i][/b]
[font=Courier New]Lungs -[/font][b][font=Comic Sans MS][i]p[/i][/font][/b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][i]oison resistant and waterbreatheng[/i][/font][/b]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Cloak -[/size][/font][i][b][font=Comic Sans MS] fire resistant[/font][/b][/i]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Limbs Augmented -[/size][/font][i][b][font=Comic Sans MS]reduced falling damage[/font][/b][/i]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Legs Augmented -[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]Muffled movement[/i][/b][/font]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Scholar [/size][/font][i][b][font=Courier New][size=3]-[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS] speechcraft and magicka reg.[/font][/b][/i]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Alarm [/size][/font][i][b][font=Courier New][size=3]- [/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]Alerts you when enemy crosses 100 ft perimetar[/font][/b][/i]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Soak [/size][/font][b][i][font=Courier New][size=3]-[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS] Armor rating icnreased by 25 pts.[/font][/i][/b]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Fortifiy Speed -[/size][/font][b][i][font=Comic Sans MS] you move 20% faster[/font][/i][/b]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Negate MAgic -[/size][/font][b][i][font=Comic Sans MS]10% more resistance to magic[/font][/i][/b]
[font=Courier New][size=3]Advanced Soak[/size][/font][b][i][font=Courier New][size=3] -[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS] tako 30% less damage from power attacks and bashes[/font][/i][/b]


[b][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][i]Hope you like it :)

[/i][/font][i]Credits also go to Enai Siaion[/i][/size][/b]
author: ibrica_orahovac
